Audio.Author: Teus Luijendijk
Audio.Comments: Horrible recording due to traffic on the main road, filtered in low frequencies. Two birds present, one at close range in scorched roadside, can be seen at http://youtu.be/TTmmc0PDV-Q The second individual, a bit further away, was the bird recorded here.Remarks are welcome!bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
